data.text: @DrTomFrieden Dear Tom, your tweet looks like one step towards rationality. Have you quit being a shaper? Or will it all start again next season? I appreciate your tweet.
@DrTomFrieden More lies... Geez mate, give it a rest. Everything that trots off this account is nothing more than a shilling
@DrTomFrieden What should vaccine do to stop Covid infection?
@DrTomFrieden You should be ashamed of yourself lying scumbag https://t.co/pzWr4fffSW
@DrTomFrieden Our county is still high therefore I mask. Most are not, sadly!
@ejd2 @DrTomFrieden Isn't "nearly" is the key. It's your choice to inhale and incubate the virus. But we still recommend not killing your neighbor.
@DrTomFrieden Maybe you can also suggest, oh I dunno, hand washing?!? And possibly educate people on the uselessness of repeatedly wearing used, moist, bacteria soaked masks?
@DrTomFrieden Will share when they are ready to market
